body.name: Steamer for Clothes, 1600W Handheld Clothes Steamer with Ironing Gloves, 3 Modes Steam Garment & Fabric Wrinkle Remover with 15S Fast Heat-up, 380ml Water Tank, Fabric Brush, Steamer Iron for Home
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 23 mins
features: ❣EASY TO USE HANDHELD STEAMER❣ - Smart garment steamer has 3 steam modes to choose from. This 1600W garment steamer has a powerful steam function, can be preheated in 15 seconds, with a removable 380ml water tank that can continuously steam for 30 minutes, which is faster and more effective in removing unhealthy substances, and tough wrinkles on clothes than others.

❣360° ANTI-SPILL & ANTI-LEAK STEAMER❣ - This clothing steamer is an alternative to the old-style steamer iron. This steamer for clothes is 360°anti-leak, no matter how you hold it, doesn't spill or spray hot water and stays cool on the outside. You can enjoy safe and dry ironing without the risk of burns and water spills with this handheld clothes steamer.

❣SUITS FOR VARIOUS MATERIALS STEAMER❣ - This garment steam is not just for clothes, but for every fabric that needs to be ironed at home or on the go, such as organic fabrics, nylon blends, wool, cotton, shirts, t-shirts, curtains, and even jeans. This garment steamer also has a fabric brush, so it's safe to use on delicate fabric, including silk & lace.

❣PORTABLE & COMPACT SIZE TRAVEL STEAMER❣ - Refresh your clothes on business and family trips. The compact travel steamer removes all the wrinkles on your clothes and fits in the smallest travel bag. Place your travel steamer, fabric brush and mini water cup in the pouch the steamer comes with, and just place it in your travel bag.

❣DETACHABLE WATER TANK STEAMER❣ - The detachable design makes the steamer easy to refill. The transparent design of the water tank allows for a clear observation of the remaining water and 30 minutes of continuous steam (380ml) allows you to remove wrinkles, straighten more clothes at one time. The clothes steamer has cables and is 118 inches long.
body.description: Portable powerful handheld steamer gives you that fabulous steam experience you crave, efficient use on a wide range of fabrics. ♾️ACCESSORIES: 💖Garment Steamer ⏩Powerful enough to remove wrinkles and stains from even the most stubborn clothes 💖Ironing Gloves ⏩A professional anti steam mitt with finger loop heat resistant ironing board to protect your hands from the hot water 💖Fabric Brush with Line Clip ⏩Includes a fabric brush to remove dust from your clothing, a line clip that sharpens the edges of collars/ties 💖Measuring Cup ⏩Helps you to fill the tank more easily without leaking anywhere. 💖Storage Bag ⏩A dust-proof storage bag where you can store the garment steamer during travel 💖User Manual ⏩Helping you to use our steam iron for the most effective cleaning and de-wrinkling. 💘3 Steam Levels Clothing steamer mode has 3 steam outputs to take the wrinkles off a heavy fabric. Low: Green Light Middle: Blue Light High: Red Light 💘Powerful and Gentle Steam 15s fast heat up to high temperature, ironing efficiently within 3 minutes. You can iron your clothes instantly. 💘Advanced Safety Features Water should not be over the max line. Pump-steam technology allows steam of clothes whether hanging vertically or lying flat. 💘Mini Style The portable steamer is ideal for use at home or when traveling and can easily fit into your suitcase or overnight bag. 💘No Leak This steamer 360° portability provides a steaming no matter the angle you use it. 💘Multi-functional Button: This travel size clothes steamer comes with combination function modes, that include 'press to steam' and 'continuous steam'. 💓Specifications: 💕Power: 1600W 💕Safety voltage: 110V 💕Fast heating: 15S 💕Water tank: 380ML

productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: 1600 watts of energy produces a powerful steam flow, quickly and efficiently removing wrinkles from your clothes. Portable and compact design makes it a great travel companion, easily fitting into your luggage and freeing up space while on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Some of my dresses and coats were very wrinkly after dried from washing machine. This one I bought is much easy to use. I don’t have to find a flat table for the clothes while worrying about the heat would do harm to the wooden surface. I can just hang the close somewhere and take the handle to make them flat and tidy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Delightful Discovery!
reviews.reviewText: Just had to share my excitement about the Steamer for Clothes—it's a lifesaver! Quick 15-second heat-up, three steam modes, and handy extras like gloves and a fabric brush make it a dream. Bye-bye wrinkles, hello hassle-free mornings! Highly recommend to my fellow wrinkle warriors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The steamer works well and does not leak.
reviews.reviewText: I love this steamer. I works well, heats very quickly and does a good job in removing wrinkles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: East to use and got the job done!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and store
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use and it does help to remove wrinkles. It’s also easy to store with a nice bag. Very practical.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good to use at home
reviews.reviewText: The device comes in slightly bigger size than I thought, so I would recommend using it at home instead of traveling. The iron piece has a protected film over it when you unbox which I think it's great. Start from the low temperature if you haven't used a steamer before and be sure to use the gloves so you don't get burned from the steam if you were to hold your clothes. The storage bag is quite big that it fits everything! There is also a fabric brush that I haven't got a chance to use yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use and super helpful handy tool to make my suite look neat and good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product has a clean and pure appearance, very elegant, just the way I like it. Its functionality is also good; it's just the right size to hold, and after following the instructions and adding water, I tried it on a few shirts. The experience was great, and it also does a good job cleaning pet hair. It's a convenient size, easy to store. I would recommend it to friends who need it.
